string.name: progress_download_geocaches
string.comment: Progress dialog message for downloading geocaches.

string.name: error_locus_not_found
string.comment: Error dialog message when Locus map is not installed.

resources.string: Die App \'Locus Map\' wurde nicht gefunden, wird aber von Geocaching4Locus benötigt. Bitte Locus Map installieren.

string.name: error_location_disabled
string.comment: Error dialog message in search nearest screen when user has disabled location services like GPS.

resources.string: Positionsbestimmung via WiFi, mobile Netzwerke oder GPS erlauben: \'Settings\'.

string.name: progress_acquire_gps_location
string.comment: Progress dialog message when add-on is trying to retrieve location coordinates from GPS.

string.name: progress_acquire_network_location
string.comment: Progress dialog message when add-on is trying to retrieve location coordinates from Wi-Fi / mobile network.

string.name: action_settings
string.comment: Title of ActionBar/Toolbar button in Search nearest activity which open add-on settings.

string.name: error_coordinates_format
string.comment: Error dialog message if coordinates enter in search nearest screen are not valid. This message can be shown after touch on Download FAB button.

string.name: title_coordinates
string.comment: Title of coordinates section in Search nearest screen.

string.name: pref_distance
string.comment: Title of distance setting item in Filter section in add-on settings.

string.name: pref_distance_summary_km
string.comment: Summary of distance setting item in Filter section in add-on settings. Used when imperial units setting is not checked.

string.name: pref_distance_summary_miles
string.comment: Summary of distance setting item in Filter section in add-on settings. Used when imperial units setting is checked.

string.name: pref_imperial_units
string.comment: Title of imperial units setting item in Advanced section in add-on settings. This change if add-on will use kilometers or miles.

string.name: pref_imperial_units_summary
string.comment: Summary of imperial units setting item in Advanced section in add-on settings. This change if add-on will use kilometers or miles.

string.name: error_no_account
string.comment: Error dialog message when user is not signed in / logged in.

resources.string: Du bist nicht eingeloggt. Bitte logge dich zuerst ein

string.name: error_old_locus_map
string.comment: Error dialog message when installed Locus Map version is too old. The '%s' is replaced with minimal required Locus Map version (eg. '3.2.0']

resources.string: Ihre Locus Map-Version ist veraltet. Geocaching4locus benötigt Version %s oder höher.

string.name: button_cancel
string.comment: Dialog button for cancel action.

string.name: pref_show_found
string.comment: Title of show found geocaches in Filter category in add-on settings.

string.name: pref_show_found_summary
string.comment: Summary of show found geocaches in Filter category in add-on settings.

string.name: pref_show_own
string.comment: Title of show own hidden (hidden by you) geocaches in Filter category in add-on settings.

string.name: pref_show_own_summary
string.comment: Summary of show own hidden (hidden by you) geocaches in Filter category in add-on settings.

string.name: menu_select_all
string.comment: ActionBar/Toolbar action button title for selecting all checkable items. Placed in geocache type and container size filter.

string.name: menu_deselect_all
string.comment: ActionBar/Toolbar action button title for selecting none (deselecting all) checkable items. Placed in geocache type and container size filter.

string.name: progress_update_geocache
string.comment: Progress dialog message for updating single geocache.

string.name: pref_logs_count
string.comment: Title of count of logs to be downloaded with geocachce choose setting in Downloading section in add-on settings.

string.name: pref_logs_count_summary
string.comment: Summary of count of logs to be downloaded with geocachce choose setting in Downloading section in add-on settings.

resources.string: Anzahl der mit dem Cache herunterzuladenden Logs

string.name: pref_show_disabled
string.comment: Title of show disabled geocaches in Filter category in add-on settings.

string.name: pref_show_disabled_summary
string.comment: Summary of show disabled geocaches in Filter category in add-on settings.

string.name: progress_download_geocache
string.comment: Progress dialog message when you try download/import geocaches to Locus Map.

string.name: pref_website
string.comment: Title of setting item which open web browser with Geocaching4Locus website. This placed in About section in add-on settings.

string.name: pref_donate_paypal
string.comment: Title of setting item which show dialog to choose Paypal currency to use for donating. This placed in About section in add-on settings.

string.name: pref_donate_paypal_summary
string.comment: Summary of setting item which show dialog to choose Paypal currency to use for donating. This placed in About section in add-on settings.

string.name: pref_donate_paypal_choose_currency
string.comment: Choose dialog title where you can choose currency for Paypal donation. This dialog is shown after touch on 'Donate via Paypal' in About section in add-on settings.

resources.string: Die restlichen Infos über den Cache herunterladen, wenn dieser in Locus Map angezeigt wird
Melden Sie sich bei Ihrem Geocaching.com Konto an
Netzwerk nicht verfügbar. Bitte überprüfen Sie Ihre Verbindung.
Live Karte ist aktiviert, bewege nun die Karte um Caches zu sehen
Sie haben den Informationsaustausch für Add-ons nicht aktiviert. Aktivierung in Locus Map unter: Einstellungen → Verschiedenes → Verbinde mit AddOns.

plurals.name: plural_error_geocache_not_found
plurals.comment: Plurals for not found geocache code error. The '%s' is replaced with geocache codes separated by coma.

string.name: title_basic_member_warning
string.comment: Title of Basic member error/warning dialog

string.name: title_premium_member_warning
string.comment: Title of Premium member error/warning dialog

string.name: error_basic_member_full_geocaching_quota_exceeded
string.comment: Error dialog message when basic member reach limit of full geocache details per day. The '%1$s' is replaced with count of full detail geocache limit (eg. '3 geocaches'), '%2$s' with period length (eg. '24 hours'), '%3$s' with time when quota will be fulfilled/reset (eg. '09:10').

resources.string:
Sie haben das Limit zum Herunterladen der kompletten Informationen von %1$s pro %2$s Periode erreicht. Ihr tägliche Anzahl wird heruntergesetzt auf %3$s.
Erwerben Sie heute bei geocaching.com eine Premium-Mitgliedschaft, um neben anderen Vorteilen alle Informationen von bis zu 6000 Caches pro Tag herunterzuladen. Besuchen Sie geocaching.com zum Upgraden.

string.name: error_premium_member_full_geocaching_quota_exceeded
string.comment: Error dialog message when premium member reach limit of full 6000 geocache details per day. The '%3$s' is replaced with time when quota will be fulfilled/reset (eg. '09:10').

resources.string: Sie haben das Limit zum Herunterladen der kompletten Informationen von %1$s pro %2$s Periode erreicht. Ihr tägliche Anzahl wird heruntergesetzt auf %3$s.

string.name: title_method_quota_exceeded
string.comment: Title of error dialog when user reach the call limit per minute for Geocaching API call.

string.name: error_method_quota_exceeded
string.comment: Message of error dialog when user reach the call limit per minute for Geocaching API call.

resources.string: Sie haben das Limit der maximalen Aktionen/Aufrufe pro Minute erreicht

plurals.name: plurals_hour
plurals.comment: Plurals for hour. The '%d' is replaced with numeric value of hour

plurals.name: plurals_minute
plurals.comment: Plurals for minute. The '%d' is replaced with numeric value of minute

string.name: pref_geocaching_live_message
string.comment: Summary of 'Powered by Geocaching Live' item in Account settings.

resources.string: Dieses Add-on ruft Informationen über Geocaches via Geocaching Live ab. Tippen hier für weitere Informationen…

string.name: error_invalid_api_response
string.comment: Error message when Geocaching Live API returns unexpected response.

resources.string:
Geocaching Live gibt eine ungültige Angabe zurück:
%s

string.name: notify_live_map
string.comment: Live map notification title. This title is used only for Android 6 and lower.

string.name: notify_live_map_message_enabled
string.comment: Live map notification message when Live map is enabled.

string.name: notify_live_map_message_disabled
string.comment: Live map notification message when Live map is disabled.

string.name: notify_live_map_action_enable
string.comment: Enable action in Live map notification. This enable Live map.

string.name: notify_live_map_action_disable
string.comment: Disable action in Live map notification. This disable Live map.

string.name: notify_live_map_action_settings
string.comment: Settings action in Live map notification. This open the Live map section in add-on settings.

string.name: error_live_map
string.comment: Base error message for unknown Live map errors. The '%s' is replaced with concrete error message.

string.name: pref_disabled_notification
string.comment: Title for Disabled notification setting in Live map section. This show Live map notification even though the Live map is disabled and Locus Map is running.

string.name: pref_disabled_notification_summary
string.comment: Summary for Disabled notification setting in Live map section. This show Live map notification even though the Live map is disabled and Locus Map is running.

resources.string: Zeigt die Benachrichtigung, wenn \"Live map\" ausgeschaltet ist. Das funktioniert nur, wenn in Locus \"periodische Updates\" erlaubt sind und Locus aktiv ist.

string.name: pref_geocache_type_all
string.comment: Summary for geocache types filter setting when all geocache types are selected.

string.name: progress_download_logs
string.comment: Progress dialog message for downloading geocache logs.

string.name: launcher_download_logs
string.comment: Share button item title in geocache detail in Locus Map, which download 100 log items for selected geocache.

string.name: pref_download_logs_update_geocache
string.comment: Title of checkbox preference in Downloading settings. If is checked, the Update logs action in POI detail screen in Locus Map will also update listing and all other geocache detail together with logs. Unchecked to update only logs.

resources.string: Logs werden heruntergeladen und der Cache wird aktualisiert

string.name: pref_download_logs_update_geocache_summary
string.comment: Summary of checkbox preference in Downloading settings. If is checked, the Update logs action in POI detail screen in Locus Map will also update listing and all other geocache detail together with logs. Unchecked to update only logs.

resources.string: Die Aktion \"Download logs\" aktualisiert gleichzeitig die Cachedaten

string.name: pref_step_geocaching_count
string.comment: Title of selectbox preference in Downloading settings.

string.name: pref_step_geocaching_count_summary
string.comment: Summary of selectbox preference in Downloading settings.

resources.string: Auswahlmenü: Anzahl der heruntergeladenen Cache in 1-er oder 10-er Schritten

string.name: error_premium_filter
string.comment: Error message when user who PM account have expired use PM account filters which cause errors on Geocaching Live API server side.

resources.string: Einige Flter erfordern Premium-Mitgliedschaft, die nicht vorliegt. Die App schaltet auf Basic-Mitgliedschaft. Bitte noch einmal versuchen.

string.name: pref_account
string.comment: Title of preference category for Account settings.

string.name: pref_live_map
string.comment: Title of preference category for Live Map settings.

string.name: pref_downloading
string.comment: Title of preference category for Downloading settings.

string.name: pref_advanced
string.comment: Title of preference category for Advanced settings.

string.name: pref_about
string.comment: Title of preference category for About settings.

string.name: title_login
string.comment: Window title for sign in task.

string.name: pref_download_hints
string.comment: Title of checkbox preference in Live Map settings.

string.name: pref_download_hints_summary
string.comment: Summary of checkbox preference in Live Map settings.

string.name: pref_feedback
string.comment: Title of preference in About settings. This will open E-mail client with pre-filled feedback e-mail.

string.name: error_no_result
string.comment: Error dialog message when no nearest geocache is found.

resources.string: Keine der Suche entsprechenden Geocaches gefunden.

string.name: error_session_expired
string.comment: Error dialog message when app has expired OAuth token for Geocaching Live API. This token expire after 90 days.

resources.string: Aufgrund längerer Inaktivität (mehr als 90 Tage) wurden sie abgemeldet. Bitte melden sie sich erneut an.

string.name: launcher_import_bookmarks
string.comment: Function name in Locus Map More functions list which show window for importing geocaches from bookmarks.

string.name: menu_import_bookmarks
string.comment: Dashboard button which show window for importing geocaches from bookmarks.

string.name: error_no_location_permission
string.comment: Error dialog message when app doesn't have gps/network location permission.

resources.string: Diese App hat keine Rechte, auf lokale Dienste zuzugreifen.

string.name: action_import_all
string.commit: Button in bookmark list which cause import all geocaches stored under this bookmark.

string.name: error_premium_feature
string.comment: Error dialog message when user with basic membership wants to use feature for premium membership users.

resources.string: Sorry, aber diese Funktion steht nur Premium Members zur Verfügung

string.name: title_locus_map_error
string.comment: Error dialog title when Locus Map error occurs.

string.name: button_send_error_report
string.comment: Button for Send error report action.

string.name: toast_error_report_sent
string.comment: Toast message showed after the user click on 'Send error report' button in error dialog.

resources.string: Vielen Dank für das Senden der Fehlermeldung.

string.name: error_continue_locus_map
string.comment: Dialog error message which is shown after the download error occurred. It's displayed only in case when some data was successfully received before this error.

resources.string: Möchtest Du mit nur teilweisem Datenempfang mit Locus Maps fortfahren?

string.name: button_yes
string.comment: Dialog button for Yes action.

string.name: button_no
string.comment: Dialog button for No action.

string.name: warning_basic_member
string.comment: Warning dialog message which is shown after the basic user is signed in.

resources.string: Nur Premium Member können die volle Leistungsfähigkeit dieser Erweiterung ausschöpfen. Als Basic Member kannst Du nur Traditionals, Events und CITOs mit grundlegenden Geocachedaten herunterladen (keine Beschreibungen, keine Hints, keine Attribute, keine Bilder, keine Logs usw.) und nur wenigen Such-Filtern herunterladen. Für weitere Informationen lesen Sie bitte die Benutzeranleitung auf der Geocaching4Locus Website.

string.name: button_show_users_guide
string.comment: Dialog button which start WebBrowser with Geocaching4Locus User's guide web page.

string.name: warning_external_storage_permission
string.comment: Warning message which is shown before request for write external storage permission.

resources.string: Die App benötigt Schreibrechte für die externe Speicherkarte, um Geocachedaten für Locus Map zu speichern. Bitte erlaube diese Berechtigung im nächsten Schritt.

string.name: error_no_external_storage_permission
string.comment: Error message when app doesn't have write external storage permission.

resources.string: Die App ist nicht berechtigt, auf externen Speicher zu schreiben. Diese Berechtigung wird für die Speicherung von Geocaching-Daten für Locus Map benötigt.

string.name: pref_hide_geocaches_on_disabled
string.comment: Title of checkbox preference in Live Map settings. Marking this checkbox will cause to hides all Live Map geocaches in Locus Map after Live Map feature is disabled.

string.name: pref_hide_geocaches_on_disabled_summary
string.content: Summary of checkbox preference in Live Map settings. Marking this checkbox will cause to hides all Live Map geocaches in Locus Map after Live Map feature is disabled.

resources.string: Verberge Geocache welche über die Live Karte angezeigt werden wenn die Live Karte ausgeschaltet wird

string.name: pref_disable_dnf_nm_na_geocaches
string.comment: Title of checkbox preference in Downloading settings. Marking this checkbox will cause to mark geocache as not available with more Did Not Fond, Needs Maintenance or Need Archived logs.

resources.string: DNF, NM und NA Caches ausschalten

string.name: pref_disable_dnf_nm_na_geocaches_summary
string.comment: Summary of checkbox preference in Downloading settings. Marking this checkbox will cause to mark geocache as not available with more Did Not Fond, Needs Maintenance or Need Archived logs.

resources.string: Kennzeichen den Geocache als nicht verfügbar wenn er mehrere Loggs mit nicht gefunden,benötigt Wartung oder sollte archiviert werden beinhaltet

string.name: pref_disable_dnf_nm_na_geocaches_logs_count
string.comment: Title of slider preference in Downloading settings. There can be selected how many Did Not Fond, Needs Maintenance or Need Archived logs (1 to 5) cause to mark geocache as not available.

resources.string: Wieviele der letzten Loggs sollen überprüft werden

string.name: launcher_watch_geocache
string.comment: Share button item title in geocache detail in Locus Map, which add geocache to watch list.

string.name: launcher_bookmark_geocache
string.comment: Share button item title in geocache detail in Locus Map, which add geocache to bookmark list.

string.name: launcher_download_rectangle
string.comment: Locus map function button title to import visible Live map geocaches to Locus map.

string.name: error_live_map_geocaches_not_visible
string.comment: Error message when user wants to import Live map geocaches, but Live map is disabled or Live map geocaches are not visible in Locus map.

resources.string: Versichere dich daß die Live Karte aktiviert ist, bewege nun die Karte um Caches zu sehen

string.name: menu_live_map_download_caches
string.comment: Dashboard button title to import visible Live map geocaches to Locus map.

string.name: checkbox_do_not_show_again
string.comment: Checkbox message in dialog which prevent to show dialog again when checkbox is checked

resources.string: Zeige diese Nachricht nicht mehr an

string.name: title_warning
string.comment: Warning dialog title

string.name: warning_power_management
string.comment: Warning dialog message which is shown, when user wants to turn on the Live Map and app detects that the Live Map feature can be affected by a manufacturer battery saver functionality.

resources.string: Ihr Android-Gerät enthält eine benutzerdefinierte Energiesparfunktion vom Gerätehersteller, die verhindert, dass Live Map ordnungsgemäß funktioniert. Bitte fügen Sie eine Ausnahme für Geocaching4Locus hinzu.

string.name: button_more_info
string.comment: Dialog button for More info action

string.name: error_locus_map
string.comment: Error dialog message for any Locus Map related error. The '%s' is replaced by error text.

string.name: error_no_write_file_permission
string.comment: Error dialog message when app can't create data file for Locus Map

resources.string: Es konnte keine Datei mit Daten für die Locus Map erstellt werden. Hast du den Zugriff auf externe Daten genehmigt?

string.name: warning_compat_android_sign_in
string.comment: Warning dialog message which is shown, when user wants to sign in with older Android device. Please make sure there is \n\n for empty line between two paragraphs.

resources.string: Die Androidversion deines Gerätes unterstützt nicht die neueste Transportsicherheitsstufe (TLS 1.1 and 1.2) für den integrierten Webbrowser.\n\n Diese App versucht stattdessen, den Webbrowser eines Drittanbieters zu verwenden. Nachdem der Zugriff auf dein Geocaching-Konto genehmigt wurde, kopieren bitte den Autorisierungscode, komm hierher zurück und füge diesen hier ein.

string.name: message_enter_authorization_code
string.comment: Input dialog message to enter authorization code from sign in process. This dialog is shown for older Android devices only.

string.name: hint_authorization_code
string.comment: Hint message in input box for Input dialog to enter authorization code from sign in process. This dialog is shown for older Android devices only.

string.name: error_invalid_authorization_code
string.comment: Error dialog message when user pasted/entered invalid authorization code in input dialog in sign in process.

resources.string: Der eingegebene Zulassungscode ist nicht gültig, versuche es noch einmal
